entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lynn Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -34.0°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 35. POP 30%
